metadata.name: zyncx
metadata.description: Privacy-preserving vault system with confidential computation on Solana

instructions.name: check_root
docs: Check if a root exists in the merkle tree history

instructions.name: confidential_swap_callback
docs: Callback from Arcium MXE after confidential computation completes
Only callable by Arcium MXE program

instructions.name: create_nullifier
docs: Create a nullifier account for confidential operations

instructions.name: deposit_native
docs: Deposit native SOL into the vault

instructions.name: deposit_token
docs: Deposit SPL tokens into the vault

instructions.name: initialize_vault
docs: Initialize a new vault for a specific asset (SOL or SPL token)

instructions.name: queue_confidential_swap
docs: Queue a confidential swap to Arcium MXE
User sends encrypted trading bounds; Arcium processes without seeing plaintext
Note: Nullifier account must already exist (prevents stack overflow)

accounts.name: nullifier_account
docs: Nullifier account - must already exist (created via separate instruction)

instructions.name: swap_native
docs: Swap native SOL via DEX (Jupiter) with ZK proof

instructions.name: swap_token
docs: Swap SPL tokens via DEX (Jupiter) with ZK proof

instructions.name: verify_proof
docs: Verify a ZK proof without executing withdrawal

instructions.name: withdraw_native
docs: Withdraw native SOL from the vault with ZK proof

instructions.name: withdraw_token
docs: Withdraw SPL tokens from the vault with ZK proof

errors.name: InvalidDepositAmount
errors.msg: Invalid deposit amount - must be greater than zero

errors.name: InvalidWithdrawalAmount
errors.msg: Invalid withdrawal amount - must be greater than zero

errors.name: InvalidSwapAmount
errors.msg: Invalid swap amount - must be greater than zero

errors.name: InvalidFeeAmount
errors.msg: Invalid fee amount - must be greater than zero

errors.name: VaultNotFound
errors.msg: Vault not found for the specified asset

errors.name: VaultAlreadyRegistered
errors.msg: Vault already registered for this asset

errors.name: AmountMismatch
errors.msg: Amount mismatch between expected and received

errors.name: NativeFundReceived
errors.msg: Native fund received for alternative asset deposit

errors.name: MaxDepthReached
errors.msg: Merkle tree has reached maximum depth

errors.name: InvalidPublicInputs
errors.msg: Invalid public inputs for ZK proof

errors.name: InvalidComputationStatus
errors.msg: Invalid computation status for this operation

errors.name: ComputationNotExpired
errors.msg: Computation has not expired yet - cannot cancel

fields.name: computation_fee
docs: Fee for using confidential computation (in lamports)

fields.name: limit_orders_enabled
docs: Whether confidential limit orders are enabled

types.name: ComputationRequest
docs: State account tracking a queued Arcium computation

fields.name: completed_at
docs: Timestamp when completed (0 if not completed)

fields.name: result
docs: Result from Arcium (encrypted or status code)

types.name: ComputationStatus
docs: Computation status in the Arcium MXE

types.name: ConfidentialSwapParams
docs: Parameters for a confidential swap request

fields.name: src_token
docs: Source token mint (what user is selling)

fields.name: dst_token
docs: Destination token mint (what user is buying)

fields.name: recipient
docs: Recipient of swapped tokens (can be shielded)
